com.epimorphics.lda.restlets

Class MetadataRestlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epimorphics.lda.restlets.MetadataRestlet

  • public class MetadataRestlet
extends Object
    Support for viewing the metadata associated with an endpoint. This shows a view of the query that is run and the specification that leads to the query but, unlike the control restlet, doesn't directly link to a dynamically updateable specification.
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Dave Reynolds
